boone.io

Interface Storable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BackpropTrainer, Brain, BrainPart, Function, Function.AboutEqual, Function.AtLeast, Function.AtMost, Function.CatmullRomSpline, Function.Clip, Function.Composition, Function.Exponential, Function.GreaterThan, Function.Identity, Function.LessThan, Function.NaturalSpline, Function.Scaled, Function.Sigmoid, Function.Signum, Function.SignumWithoutZero, Function.Sinus, Function.TanHyp, HebbTrainer, HexagonTopology, HopfieldDeltaTrainer, Link, LVQTrainer, NeuralNet, Neuron, NeuronList, NeuronPotential, PatternSet, Position, PostsynapticPotential, RpropTrainer, SOMTrainer, Spike, SpikeSet, SpikingLink, SpikingNeuralNet, SpikingNeuron, Topology, Trainer, TrainingSignalGenerator, TrainingSignalGenerator.SquareError

    public interface Storable
    Interface with methods to load and store an object instance's data from/to XML DOM. Please note that Storable classes need to have a constructor with no arguments, so that they can be correctly instantiated via reflection.
    Version:
    $Id: Storable.java 2291 2015-12-04 17:45:14Z helmut $
    Author:
    August Mayer, Helmut A. Mayer
